text: Paul Dryden Warfield (born November 28, 1942) is an American former professional football player. He was a wide receiver in the National Football League (NFL) from 1964 to 1977 for the Cleveland Browns and Miami Dolphins. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:Miami Dolphins players Category:Sportspeople from Ohio Category:American football wide receivers
title: Paul Warfield
